heading: HR00666
0: RESOLUTION STRONGLY URGING PRESIDENT RODRIGO ROA R. DUTERTE TO IMMEDIATELY RELEASE OF ALL POLITICAL PRISONERS, INCLUDING THE ELDERLY, THOSE WITH ILLNESSES, THE WOMEN, AND THOSE IMPRISONED FOR MORE THAN (10) YEARS, FOR JUST AND HUMANITARIAN REASONS, AND, THE RELEASE OF DETAINED CONSULTANTS OF THE NATIONAL DEMOCRATIC FRONT OF THE PHILIPPINES (NDFP) IN COMPLIANCE WITH THE JOINT AGREEMENT ON SAFETY AND IMMUNITY GUARANTEES (JASIG) SIGNED BY THE GOVERNMENT OF THE REPUBLIC OF THE PHILIPPINES (GRP) AND THE NATIONAL DEMOCRATIC FRONT OF THE PHILIPPINES (NDFP) AS A GOODWILL MEASURE IN THE RESUMPTION OF PEACE NEGOTIATIONS
principal-authors: ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T.; GAITE, FERDINAND R.; CULLAMAT, EUFEMIA "KA FEMIA" C.; CASTRO, FRANCE L.; BROSAS, ARLENE D.; ELAGO, SARAH JANE I.;
status: Pending with the Committee on PEACE, RECONCILIATION AND UNITY since 2020-02-03
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00666
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION STRONGLY URGING PRESIDENT RODRIGO ROA R. DUTERTE TO IMMEDIATELY RELEASE OF ALL POLITICAL PRISONERS, INCLUDING THE ELDERLY, THOSE WITH ILLNESSES, THE WOMEN, AND THOSE IMPRISONED FOR MORE THAN (10) YEARS, FOR JUST AND HUMANITARIAN REASONS, AND, THE RELEASE OF DETAINED CONSULTANTS OF THE NATIONAL DEMOCRATIC FRONT OF THE PHILIPPINES (NDFP) IN COMPLIANCE WITH THE JOINT AGREEMENT ON SAFETY AND IMMUNITY GUARANTEES (JASIG) SIGNED BY THE GOVERNMENT OF THE REPUBLIC OF THE PHILIPPINES (GRP) AND THE NATIONAL DEMOCRATIC FRONT OF THE PHILIPPINES (NDFP) AS A GOODWILL MEASURE IN THE RESUMPTION OF PEACE NEGOTIATIONS
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T., GAITE, FERDINAND R., CULLAMAT, EUFEMIA "KA FEMIA" C., CASTRO, FRANCE L., BROSAS, ARLENE D., ELAGO, SARAH JANE I.
DATE FILED : 2020-01-27
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON PEACE, RECONCILIATION AND UNITY ON 2020-02-03
